ComicInfo.Summary:
Magicman Meets Dragonia!: Magicman fights the evil sorceress Dragonia, and travels back in time to 1916 to discover the location of a cache of gold lost during World War I.
Whatever Did Happen to the Earth?: An interplanetary war in a distant galaxy eventually leads to the destruction of Earth.
Spirits Can Be Good Joes!: The residents of the Unknown want to improve their reputation, so they help a teenage hoodlum by showing him how badly his life will turn out unless he reforms.
ComicInfo.Title: Magicman Meets Dragonia!; Whatever Did Happen to the Earth?; Spirits Can Be Good Joes!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Zev Zimmer,Ace Aquila,Greg Olivetti,Zev Zimmer,Ace Aquila,Greg Olivetti
ComicInfo.Penciller: Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe
ComicInfo.Inker: Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe,Pete Costanza,Chic Stone,Edd Ashe
